conversations.value: Could you perform an in-depth analysis of this photo, including interleaved segmentation masks to map each part of your answer to specific image object?

This aerial image depicts a post-wildfire scene dominated by a large sports complex with a red track and green fields, flanked by scorched earth and vineyard rows. Multiple

destroyed buildings

[SEG] are visible as messy, off-white and gray patches of rubble scattered around the facility's perimeter. A significant concentration of ruins is located in the upper left quadrant, west of the running track (spanning approximately 43-265px width and 0-300px height). Another dense cluster of debris is found in the upper right quadrant, north and east of the tennis courts (roughly 702-1023px width and 0-200px height). Scattered damaged structures are also present in the middle-right area near the vineyards (778-970px width, 280-500px height) and along the bottom edge (283-805px width, 969-1023px height). Smaller, isolated remnants can be seen in the central region near the sports fields (299-522px width, 212-482px height).
